course.subject: LANG
course.name: Laboratory Report Writing for Life Science Students
course.description: This course focuses on developing Life Science students' ability to produce effective laboratory reports with appropriate organizational structures, vocabulary, language and style. For LIFS students only.

reviews.author: Sara
reviews.comment_content:
同course名一樣係學寫lab report
一個sem靜係上4次 另外2次見tutor傾assignment
report既內容唔重要 多數會係你做緊既lab course抽出黎
主要學返d academic language同organization
reviews.comment_teaching: 上堂輕鬆 可能要答下問題同做下notes既exercise 大致上講下report每part寫d咩
reviews.comment_grading: Mark比分算鬆手 基本上拎5無問題
reviews.comment_workload:
Two assignments: group report and individual report
交左group report後tutor會比feedback
individual個份交之前會約tutor傾下first draft有無咩問題

reviews.author: zlong
reviews.comment_content:
It is about how to write a full formal laboratory report, including the style of writing, the format, layout of tables and data etc. It would be useful when you are conducting your own experiment.
It is quite confusing to write up a full lab report with the materials they provided because most of the lab courses do not have a clear aim / purpose on what to investigate.
reviews.comment_teaching: Rebecca is nice and she gives feedback timely. Her feedback is very useful - you will know clearly what you have to do if you want a better grade.
reviews.comment_grading: I got 5.5/7 for both first and second assignment and I got an A- for the course.
reviews.comment_workload: You will have 2 assignments. The first one is an individual one which is to write an introductory paragraph of your lab report. The second one is a group work (group of 2) and you have to write a full lab report. The first assignment (introductory paragraph) can be reused in the second assignment (full report) and after sharing work with your partner the workload is very little.

reviews.author: Kabul
reviews.title: Wasting our time
reviews.comment_content:
Freaking useless course comprising of bullsh!ts. I never know what's the purpose of having such a course. It claims to familiarize us with the content and the language we should use in lab reports, but it's a sh!tty idea that the lab reports targeting professional audience are marked by random instructors with no science background at all.

Units
1️⃣ Overview of Lab Reports and Writing Style
2️⃣ Writing the Introduction
3️⃣ Discussing Findings
reviews.comment_teaching: I think the instructor has already tried his best to maximize the utility value of this course given its cr*appy design. He indeed tried his best giving feedback for our out-of-class Canvas discussion tasks.
reviews.comment_grading:
✏️ 25% Assignment 1 (Individual)
✏️ 65% Assignment 2 (In pairs)
💬 6% In-class participation
💻 4% Canvas quizzes

💯 I got 6 6.5 6.5 in assignment 1, unknown score in assignment 2 and ended up in an A.
reviews.comment_workload: Not much workload. The workload mainly lies on attendance and the 2 petty lab reports that can be done within 1 or 2 hours.

reviews.author: Lilith_lo
reviews.comment_content:
同個名一樣教你寫lab report
教下啲語言同格式有咩要求之類
基本上冇咩堂要上，唔洗上足13星期
交完第一份就冇一星期堂
跟住就隔個禮拜上
reviews.comment_teaching:
tutor幾好人，有問必答
都好鼓勵學生
會比心機集細解答你問題
同埋你指出佢錯 佢真係會改
雖然佢作為lang tutor 本身冇science底
但佢都會認真睇下人地啲文 然後先改你篇野
reviews.comment_workload:
上堂冇咩要準備，最多就係寫定啲report

兩份lab report
BCB既人做LIFS 2720, 2820 lab2 and lab5
lab 2 Amino acid separation and identification ( 30% )-work in groups of 2~3
lab 5 Enzyme kinetics of LDH (60%)-individual
